transArray.content: Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road. The number of parking spaces shared with the park Ample parking, convenient parking, and time flies. We are deeply honored to be able to give you an impressive stay. Thank you for your recognition of us. The hotel room size is limited by the rental property space. Although the hotel is small, it is well-equipped. The room facilities and equipment can meet your daily needs when you are away from home. With your support, we can make Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel possible. All employees are confident on the way forward and look forward to seeing you again. I wish you all the best during your holiday! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
